testcase.name: testOrderUpdateDispatchInventoryDetailsAfterUpdateOrder

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Pending Stock value Before Create Order is: 52, New Ordered Quantity is: 7, Expected Pending Stock value (Pending Stock Value Before Updating Order + New Ordered Quantity) After Update Order is: 59, But Actual Pending Stock value After Update Order is: 57. Incorrect, Expected Intransient Stock value (Intransient Stock value After Update Order = Intransient Stock value Before Create Order) After Update Order is: 42 But Actual Intransient Stock value After Update Order is: 44. Incorrect, Expected Available Stock value (Available Stock value After Update Order = Available Stock value Before Create Order) After Update Order is: 99952 But Actual Available Stock value After Update Order is: 99950. Incorrect

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: Pending Stock value Before Create Order is: 52, New Ordered Quantity is: 7, Expected Pending Stock value (Pending Stock Value Before Updating Order + New Ordered Quantity) After Update Order is: 59, But Actual Pending Stock value After Update Order is: 57. Incorrect, Expected Intransient Stock value (Intransient Stock value After Update Order = Intransient Stock value Before Create Order) After Update Order is: 42 But Actual Intransient Stock value After Update Order is: 44. Incorrect, Expected Available Stock value (Available Stock value After Update Order = Available Stock value Before Create Order) After Update Order is: 99952 But Actual Available Stock value After Update Order is: 99950.
